title: Complete React Development Course
description: Master React from fundamentals to advanced concepts including hooks, context, and state management. Build real-world applications with modern React practices.

lessons.title: Introduction to React
lessons.content: Welcome to React! In this lesson, we'll explore what React is, why it's popular, and how it fits into the modern web development ecosystem. React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, particularly web applications. It was created by Facebook and has become one of the most popular tools for front-end development. We'll cover the component-based architecture, virtual DOM, and the declarative programming paradigm that makes React so powerful.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
lessons.content: Getting your development environment ready is crucial for a smooth learning experience. We'll install Node.js, set up Create React App, and configure your code editor with helpful extensions. You'll learn about the project structure, understand the key files, and run your first React application. We'll also cover essential development tools like React Developer Tools browser extension.

lessons.title: Your First React Component
lessons.content: Components are the building blocks of React applications. In this lesson, you'll create your first functional component and understand JSX syntax. We'll explore the difference between functional and class components, learn about props, and see how components can be composed together to build complex UIs. You'll also learn best practices for naming and organizing components.

lessons.title: Understanding useState Hook
lessons.content: The useState hook is fundamental to managing state in functional components. We'll explore how to declare state variables, update them, and understand the rules of hooks. You'll learn about state immutability, handling objects and arrays in state, and common patterns for state updates. We'll build interactive components that respond to user input.

lessons.title: useEffect for Side Effects
lessons.content: Side effects like API calls, subscriptions, and DOM manipulation are handled with useEffect. We'll cover the effect dependency array, cleanup functions, and different effect patterns. You'll learn when effects run, how to optimize performance, and avoid common pitfalls like infinite loops. We'll build components that fetch data and handle asynchronous operations.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design. Create beautiful, functional designs that users love to interact with.

lessons.title: Color Theory and Psychology
lessons.content: Color is one of the most powerful tools in a designer's toolkit. We'll explore color theory fundamentals, including the color wheel, color harmonies, and how colors affect emotions and behavior. You'll learn about color accessibility, contrast ratios, and how to choose color palettes that enhance usability and create the right mood for your designs.

lessons.title: Typography and Readability
lessons.content: Typography is the art and technique of arranging type to make written language legible and appealing. We'll cover font selection, hierarchy, spacing, and readability principles. You'll learn about different font categories, how to pair fonts effectively, and the impact of typography on user experience and brand perception.

lessons.title: User Research Methods
lessons.content: Understanding your users is the foundation of great UX design. We'll explore various research methods including interviews, surveys, usability testing, and analytics. You'll learn how to create user personas, journey maps, and translate research insights into design decisions that solve real user problems.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Master Python programming for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning. Work with real datasets and build data-driven solutions.

lessons.title: Python Environment Setup
lessons.content: Setting up a proper Python environment is crucial for data science work. We'll install Python, Anaconda, and Jupyter Notebooks. You'll learn about virtual environments, package management with pip and conda, and essential libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib. We'll also set up VS Code with Python extensions for development.

lessons.title: NumPy for Numerical Computing
lessons.content: NumPy is the foundation of data science in Python. We'll explore arrays, vectorized operations, and broadcasting. You'll learn array indexing, slicing, reshaping, and mathematical operations. We'll cover random number generation, statistical functions, and how NumPy integrates with other data science libraries.

lessons.title: DataFrames and Series
lessons.content: Pandas is the go-to library for data manipulation in Python. We'll explore DataFrames and Series, the core data structures. You'll learn data loading from CSV, JSON, and databases, data selection and filtering, and basic data cleaning operations. We'll work with real datasets to understand data types and handle missing values.

title: Digital Marketing Strategy
description: Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies that drive results. Learn SEO, social media marketing, and conversion optimization.

lessons.title: Understanding Your Target Audience
lessons.content: Effective marketing starts with understanding your audience. We'll explore customer segmentation, buyer personas, and market research techniques. You'll learn how to identify customer pain points, preferences, and behaviors. We'll cover demographic and psychographic analysis, and how to use this information to craft targeted marketing messages.

lessons.title: Content Marketing Strategy
lessons.content: Content is the foundation of digital marketing. We'll develop a content strategy that attracts, engages, and converts your audience. You'll learn about content types, editorial calendars, and distribution channels. We'll cover storytelling techniques, brand voice development, and measuring content performance.

title: Business Strategy & Leadership
description: Develop strategic thinking and leadership skills for business success. Learn planning, team management, and decision-making frameworks.

lessons.title: SWOT Analysis and Market Assessment
lessons.content: Strategic planning begins with understanding your position in the market. We'll conduct thorough SWOT analysis (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) and market assessment. You'll learn competitive analysis techniques, industry trend identification, and how to position your business for success in changing markets.

title: Advanced JavaScript & Node.js
description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level. Master async programming, Node.js, and build full-stack applications.

lessons.title: Closures and Scope
lessons.content: Closures are a fundamental concept in JavaScript that enable powerful programming patterns. We'll explore lexical scoping, function factories, and module patterns. You'll understand how closures work under the hood, their practical applications, and common use cases in modern JavaScript development.
